description: A University at Buffalo team has redesigned the truncated Wigner approximation into an easy, plug-and-play template that lets scientists run complex quantum simulations on everyday laptops. The method works for open systems, slashes computing demands, and helps free supercomputers for the hardest quantum problems.
title: New Shortcut Lets Scientists Run Complex Quantum Models on a Laptop

description: A new global map of glacier speeds, built from nearly a decade of satellite observations, shows that glaciers consistently move faster in summer and slower in winter. Meltwater acts as a natural lubricant, accelerating flow during warm months. Scientists warn that glaciers with strong seasonal shifts are likely to speed up long-term, adding to future sea-level rise.
title: Glaciers Speed Up in Summer and Slow in Winter, New Global Map Reveals

description: Streaming on ZEE5, Be Dune Teen delivers warmth, comedy, and relatable family drama as Abhay and Neha navigate the surprising journey of expecting triplets.
title: Be Dune Teen OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Marathi Comedy Drama Series

description: The ICCID number is a unique number, and it acts like a serial identifier for your SIM card. You can check your SIM number through the Settings app or by physically removing the SIM card to read the number printed on it. Here's a guide to help you find it in under a minute.
title: How to Find SIM Number on Android: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: The 2025 audio landscape is defined by smarter features, better design, and a stronger focus on real-world listening. Brands are refining ANC, spatial audio, and battery performance while improving comfort, connectivity, and app-driven personalisation. This year also brings bold design shifts, fresh entries into new categories, and more powerful TWS options under Rs. 6,000. Whether you prioritise workouts, immersive home entertainment, or premium everyday listening, 2025 delivers meaningful upgrades across the board.
title: Best Audio Products of 2025: Sony WH-1000XM6, Nothing Headphone 1, Beats Powerbeats Fit, and More

description: Four More Shots Please Season 4 delivers a vibrant, emotionally rich conclusion to the popular series. With the four friends exploring relationships, courage, and self-discovery, the finale blends humour, drama, and a fresh beach setting. Now streaming on Amazon Prime Video, it continues to engage viewers with its lively storytelling.
title: Four More Shots Please Season 4 OTT Release: Where to Watch the Final Chapter of the Web Series

description: Nari Nari Naduma Murari is a delightful romantic drama that follows a charming hero caught between the love of two sisters. The film blends humour, heartfelt emotions, and family warmth as relationships get tested and resolved.
title: Nari Nari Naduma Murari OTT Release: Know Where to Watch the Telugu Comedy Entertainer

description: Bank of Baroda or BOB customers can check their account balance via various online and offline methods. While some people might prefer visiting a branch in their vicinity, it is not always possible to do so. If such scenarios, you can check your BOB account balance through the bank's mobile banking app, internet banking, SMS and missed call banking, or WhatsApp. The financial institution's app is available on the Google Play Store for Android phone users and on Apple's App Store for iPhone owners.
title: Bank of Baroda Balance Check Number: How to Check BOB Account Balance Online Using Different Methods
